name: International Conference on Smart Systems and Inventive Technology
content: International Conference on Smart Systems and Inventive Technology (ICSSIT 2019) is being organized by Francis Xavier Engineering College, Tirunelveli, India during December 13-14, 2018\. ICSSIT 2018 will provide an outstanding international forum for sharing knowledge and results in all fields of science, engineering and Technology. ICSSIT provides quality key experts who provide an opportunity in bringing up innovative ideas. Recent updates in the in the field of technology will be a platform for the upcoming researchers. The conference will be Complete, Concise, Clear and Cohesive in terms of research related to Smart Systems and Technology.
